Controlled:
const Controlled = () => {
  const [isOpen, setOpen] = createSignal(false)
  return (
    <>
      <button onClick={() => setOpen(!isOpen)}>click me</button>
      <HoverCard open={isOpen()} onClose={() => setOpen(false)}>
        <HoverCardTrigger>Hover me</HoverCardTrigger>
        <Portal>
          <HoverCardPositioner>
            <HoverCardContent>
              <HoverCardArrow>
                <HoverCardArrowTip />
              </HoverCardArrow>
              Content
            </HoverCardContent>
          </HoverCardPositioner>
        </Portal>
      </HoverCard>
    </>
  )
}
Positioning:
const Positioning = () => (
  <HoverCard positioning={{ placement: 'right', gutter: 12 }}>
    <HoverCardTrigger>Hover me</HoverCardTrigger>
    <Portal>
      <HoverCardPositioner>
        <HoverCardContent>
          <HoverCardArrow>
            <HoverCardArrowTip />
          </HoverCardArrow>
          Content
        </HoverCardContent>
      </HoverCardPositioner>
    </Portal>
  </HoverCard>
)
